name: CHD_49
description: CHD is a dataset from the medical domain. It describes the problem of diagnosing coronary heart disease via traditional Chinese medicine approaches. The features represent the presence or absence of different symptoms accessed via feelings of cold or warm, sweating, head, body, chest, urine etc. The labels represent the 6 commonly-used patterns, including deficiency of heart qi syndrome, deficiency of heart yang syndrome, deficiency of heart yin syndrome, qi stagnation syndrome, turbid phlegm syndrome, and blood stasis syndrome.
